Container.Name: xtream-to-strm-web_test
Container.Overview:
Xtream to STRM - Jellyfin Media Management
Transform your Xtream Codes subscriptions and M3U playlists into Jellyfin-compatible media files with this modern, production-ready web application.
Multi-Source Support: Xtream Codes API and M3U playlists (URL or file upload) Selective Sync: Choose specific categories/groups for movies and series Rich Metadata: NFO files with TMDB integration and configurable formatting Modern Web UI: Responsive dashboard with real-time sync monitoring Smart NFO Formatting: Regex patterns, date formatting, name cleaning Administration Tools: Database and file management built-in

Config.Name: /output
Config.Description: Path of the generated strm enf nfo files

Config.Name: Port
Config.Description: Web access port : 8000 is the internal web app port
